additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sorbitol, Water, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Trisodium Phosphate, Cellulose Gum, Flavour, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Saccharin, Carbomer, Sodium Fluoride, Polysorbate 80, CI 42090.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not swallow. Children under 2 years: Ask a dentist. Children of 6 years and younger: Use a pea sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor. Contains Sodium Fluoride. Do not swallow.Children under 2 years.
